title: The Edinburgh tales.
author: Johnstone, C. I.
snippet: And the bride jerked forward her head that the ensconced ladies might have a satisfactory  view of her white satin hat and its snowy " swaling" plumes ; and then rolled rapidly away to that memorable examination of the Hamilton House Picture Gallery, which enabled Mrs. Mark Luke to descant on the Fine Arts for fifteen years afterwards, and her husband to wonder at her astonishing  memory.
